types.html:
antiacadémique (plural antiacadémiques)

  1. antiacademic (opposed to academic principles)
    Bien que certains considèrent ses idées comme antiacadémiques, son livre a connu un grand succès auprès des jeunes étudiants en philosophie.
    Although some consider his ideas to be anti-academic, his book has been very successful among young philosophy students.

types.section:
{{fr-noun|mf}}

# an [[antiacademic]] {{gloss|one who opposes that which is academic}}
types.html:
antiacadémique m or f (plural antiacadémiques)

  1. an antiacademic (one who opposes that which is academic)
